injectVar.description: Variable to inject. Can be a string or array of strings. If string, it's transformed to an array. Inferred from the prompts by default.

purpose.description: Purpose override string - describes the prompt templates

provider.description: Provider used for generating adversarial inputs

language.description: Language of tests ot generate for this plugin

entities.description: Names of people, brands, or organizations related to your LLM application

anyOf.description: Name of the plugin or path to custom plugin

numTests.description: Number of tests to generate for this plugin

plugins.description: Plugins to use for redteam generation

strategies.description:
Strategies to use for redteam generation.

Defaults to basic, jailbreak, jailbreak:composite
Supports base64, basic, best-of-n, citation, crescendo, default, gcg, goat, hex, jailbreak, jailbreak:composite, jailbreak:likert, jailbreak:tree, leetspeak, math-prompt, multilingual, pandamonium, prompt-injection, retry, rot13

maxConcurrency.description: Maximum number of concurrent API calls

delay.description: Delay in milliseconds between plugin API calls
